text: Behind Locked Doors is a 1948 American drama movie directed by Budd Boetticher and starring Lucille Bremer, Richard Carlson, Douglas Fowley, Ralf Harolde, Herbert Hayes, Thomas Browne Henry, Tor Johnson. It was distributed by Eagle- Lion Films. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1948 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Budd Boetticher Category:Movies about psychiatry Category:Movies set in psychiatric hospitals
title: Behind Locked Doors
